name: DonutChaox
description:
Hi there!  This is our game for Brackeys Game Jam 2021.2. -> Theme: Let There be Chaos.  

 "You will be a dauntless pink bunny, making donuts in a chaotic kitchen, while angry customers come to you for it's favorites flavors! So give them what they want with your space ship! "

We create almost everything in Donutchaox in the past 6 days! So the game it's not the most polished, but we did it with love and a lot of fun!   I can't modify the submission to fix the web loading error so check the game here if you want: https://kailcor.itch.io/donutchaox-fixedversion!  Story:  He is kuni a rabbit with a lot of impetus, expert in the kitchen and specialist in donuts that never stops. They are the gummy one insatiable gluttons who only live to eat but have a very bad temper when their needs are not met. They will have a fantastic start but both you and I do not know how they are going but very soon we are going to discover them to give them the story that these beautiful characters deserve. Kuni: kitchen addict, machine builder, agile and friendly Gumy: eaters, angry and sticky

I hope you enjoy it! We will keep working on it, so we'll wait for your feedback. SIDE NOTE: We have to upload it again because it doesn't loaded!

A little bit about us:  We are 2 friends, and  wife and husband team!  It's out first time in a GameJam! Juan S, Juan P, Ana and Angel (me) are a group of friends that really loves games, so this it's our fist try to create one by ourselves! 

Visit our Instagram for more:
Angel R. y Ana F - Anka Ilcor Games.

https://twitch.tv/kailcor
